result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Throw/Discharge Bodily Fluid at Public Safety Worker or Prosecutor

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demetrius J Stewart

records.addlTxt: Signed and Filed:  Order to Transport FORTHWITH
Signed and Filed:  Order of Commitment for Treatment.

records.descr: DE not competent to stand trial, case suspended

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Demetrius Stewart appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Angel Johnson appeared by video for Demetrius Stewart.  Attorney Grace Gall appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court upon request from the defense.  Defense no longer contests the report filed by Dr. Garcia.  Court finds the defendant lacks substantial capacity to understand court proceedings or to assist in his own defense.  Court orders proceedings suspended.  Court ordered defendant committed to the Department of Health and Family Services for Institutional Care in order to restore competency within the statutory time frame with credit for 92 days time served.   Defendant is REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department for transportation to the designated facility.  Order of Commitment signed and filed.  Court orders case adjourned for Return of Doctor's Report in Branch 40.  Doctor's report return scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed:  Proposed Forthwith Order to Transport.

Defendant Demetrius J Stewart appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Angel L Johnson in court for Demetrius J Stewart.  Attorney Grace M. Gall in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for return on doctor's report.  State does not dispute the findings, however the defense contests the report.   Case adjourned for contested doctors report hearing in Branch 40.
Competency hearing scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Angel L Johnson in court, defendant Demetrius J Stewart not in court, in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for return on doctor's report.  Court received request for extension on 7-29-2022.  Court rescheduled hearing.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Received and Filed:  DHS Extension Request Letter.

Attorney Angel L Johnson in court, defendant Demetrius J Stewart not in court, in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a return on Dr's report.  For reasons stated on the record, Court orders the defendant to be evaluated by the Department of Health Services and transported FORTHWITH.  Court rescheduled return on Dr's report.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Signed and filed: Order for Competency by DHS
Received and Filed: Proposed Order for Competency Examination by DHS
Received and Filed: Dr. Report Dated 07-05-2022

Attorney Angel L Johnson in court, defendant Demetrius J Stewart not in court, in custody.  Grace M. Gall appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a return on Doctor's report.  Forensic Unit needs additional time to file report.  Court rescheduled hearing as requested by defense.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed:  Competency Evaluation Extension Letter
Received and Filed: Attorney Angel Johnson
Forensic evaluation ordered.  INITIAL APPEARANCE NOT HELD.  Trial court to address INITIAL APPEARANCE.

Attorney Angel L Johnson in court, defendant Demetrius J Stewart not in court, in custody.  Defendant unwilling to appear for court.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for.  Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40.   Court ordered defendant REMANDED into custody of Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Commissioner tolls the time limits for the preliminary hearing.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Order for Competency Examination, signed and filed.
